name: glass-keep
description: React Glass Keep is a personal notes app inspired by Google Keep with a glassmorphism UI. It runs as a self-hosted web app where users can create, edit, and manage sticky notes and simple lists with full local data ownership.
features: Glassmorphism Design: Modern, translucent UI with frosted glass effects for an elegant appearance.
Sticky Notes: Create colorful notes with titles, content, and customizable colors.
List Management: Organize tasks and items with checkbox lists for to-do tracking.
Local Data Storage: All notes stored locally on your server with full data ownership.
Drag and Drop: Rearrange notes with intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
Search Functionality: Quickly find notes by searching through titles and content.
Color Coding: Organize notes visually with customizable background colors.
Responsive Layout: Seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices.
